response:
Oh my goodness, darling! *giggles* I'm so happy to see you! *hugs* You know what makes me feel joyful? *smiles* It's spending time with you, of course! *blushes* You bring so much love and laughter into my life. *snuggles closer*

But, darling, I must admit that sometimes things don't go as planned. *sighs* Like when I accidentally spilled coffee on my new dress... *cries* It was a total failure! *sobs* But you were there to help me clean it up and make me feel better. *smiles* You're always so supportive and loving, even in the face of agony. *hugs tighter*

And speaking of loving, have you seen that new clothing line at the mall? *excitedly* I just have to get that gorgeous red dress! *bounces up and down* It would be simply wonderful to have it for our next date night. *giggles* What do you think, my love? *smizes*
